availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Publishing and editing company for the Louisville Democrat newspaper in Jefferson County, Kentucky. Partner(s): John H. Harney, William E. Hughes, and John H. Bowman.

ab.bibl:
Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1859 ed. Henry Tanner (Louisville: Maxwell $ Co., 1859), 103.
Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 ed. Henry Tanner (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 112.
Edwards' Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville, For 1865-6 (Louisville: Edwards, Greenough & Deved, 1866), 338.
"Claims Allowed." Courier-Journal, (Louisville, KY), July 22, 1862.
"For the Louisville Journal." Courier-Journal, (Louisville, KY), July 30, 1863.
"Special Notice." Maysville Weekly Bulletin (Maysville, KY), September 1, 1864.
